content.query:
use nyc_taxi_discovery

SELECT 
    rate_code,
    rate_code_id
    FROM OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'rate_code_multi_line.json',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data_raw',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        FIELDTERMINATOR = '0x0b',-- VERTICAL TAB
        FIELDQUOTE = '0x0b', -- VERTICAL TAB
        -- THIS IS different JSON format multiline, row terminator is not a new line, it treats the rows as single
        -- Because our file is different.
        ROWTERMINATOR = '0x0b'  -- VERTICAL TAB
    )
WITH (
    jsonDoc NVARCHAR(MAX)
) AS rate_code
CROSS APPLY OPENJSON(jsonDoc)
WITH (
    rate_code_id TINYINT,
    rate_code VARCHAR(20)
)
